vessels.name: ZHONG DA 79
vessels.intel_notes: Commercial container feeder converted to arsenal ship. Observed with containerized VLS, CIWS, and radar systems at Shanghai shipyard. Underwent refit at Longhai shipyard April-August 2025. Currently moored at industrial pier on Huangpu River, Shanghai. NOT listed in PLAN registry - retains civilian designation despite visible military modifications.

events.title: Entered Longhai Shipyard
events.description: ZHONG DA 79 entered Longhai shipyard for extended stay. Purpose unknown at time of entry.

events.title: AIS Signal Lost
events.description: Vessel went dark for extended period during shipyard stay. Common for refit activities.

events.title: Structural Modifications Observed
events.description: Satellite imagery indicates deck modifications consistent with weapons platform installation.

events.title: Departed Longhai Shipyard
events.description: ZHONG DA 79 departed Longhai after approximately 4 months of refit work.

events.title: Moored at Shanghai Industrial Pier
events.description: Vessel arrived at industrial pier on Huangpu River near Hudong-Zhonghua facilities.

events.title: Containerized VLS Confirmed
events.description: Photographs emerged showing 48-60 containerized VLS cells arranged on deck. Type 1130 CIWS and Type 726 decoy launchers also visible.

events.title: OSINT: Major Media Coverage
events.description: Multiple international news outlets report on arsenal ship conversion. United24 Media, Naval News, The War Zone, Newsweek all publish articles.

osint.title: Cargo Ship or Warship? China Arms Civilian Vessel With 60 Missiles
osint.summary: China converted a civilian container ship into an arsenal ship with 60 containerized missiles, CIWS, radar while retaining civilian status.

osint.title: Container Ship Turned Missile Battery Spotted in China
osint.summary: Naval News analysis of ZHONG DA 79 conversion with expert commentary on strategic implications.

osint.title: Photos Show Chinese Cargo Ship Armed With Missile Launchers
osint.summary: Newsweek coverage with geopolitical context and Taiwan Strait implications.

osint.title: Chinese Cargo Ship Packed Full Of Modular Missile Launchers Emerges
osint.summary: Technical analysis of containerized weapons systems and potential to turn any cargo ship into a weapons platform.
